title: Calories in 85/15 Ground Beef
meta_description: Discover calories in 85/15 ground beef per 100 g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown for cooked patties.
assumptions: Cooked (broiled patty), drained of fat; 85% lean meat / 15% fat.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact lean ratio, cooking method, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of cooked 85/15 ground beef provides ~250 kcal and ~26 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to 90/10 lean ground beef (per 100 g)
Pan-fried with 1 tsp added oil (per 100 g)

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g of 85/15 ground beef?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for cooked, broiled 85/15 ground beef.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 85/15 ground beef?
faqs.a: Approximately 25.9 g protein per 100 g cooked.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in ground beef?
faqs.a: Cooking concentrates calories per gram due to water loss; raw is ~215 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: What makes 85/15 ground beef different from 80/20?
faqs.a: 85/15 has less fat (15% vs 20%), so fewer calories (~250 vs ~270 kcal per 100 g cooked).
